new_config:
{
  "output_path": "system_data.json",
  "log_path": "sysmon.log",
  "collection_interval": 1,
  "verbose": false,
  "collect_cpu": true,
  "collect_memory": true,
  "collect_load": true,
  "collect_disk": true,
  "collect_network": true,
  "collect_uptime": true,
  "collect_processes": true,
  "collect_swap": true
}
